product_name: Salomon X Ultra Mid GTX Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Salomon X Ultra Mid GTX hiking shoes bring running-shoe comfort to the trail. With waterproof uppers and built-in support, these shoes are ready to take on wet, uneven trails with you.
short_description: The Salomon X Ultra Mid GTX hiking shoes bring running-shoe comfort to the trail. With waterproof uppers and built-in support, these shoes are ready to take on wet, uneven trails with you.
